name: Remedy (itch) (thorbjornsloth)
description:
Don't let you mom turn into a zombie! 

Play as a lonely little girl struggling to survive in a postapocalyptic version of the south swedish city of Malmö, sometime around the late 90s. Armed with merely a frying pan and a sling shot, you need to combat your way through hordes of mutated giant crabs and dogs (and birds?) to find all the ingredients to make the remedy for your poor dying infected mom.

This game is a student project, made in 4 weeks at The Game Assembly. It will not recieve any fixes or updates.

 Thanks for playing!!
